doc.title: Instantaneous Ejaculation Disorder (IED)
doc.plot: This informative video about Instantaneous Ejaculation Disorder (IED) is sponsored by the Pharmaceutical giant Rhyzer and is presented by esteemed Dr. Prematuro of the Hospital of Erectile Dysfunctions and other Male Genitalia Hindrances. The primary objective of this video is to introduce people suffering from this debilitating illness to Ramencide and it's help in treating the symptoms of IED. Dr. Prematuro is masterful in his delicate handling of the subject. Making those afflicted feel his grasp on their condition is firm and well-balanced. This video contains accurate footage of actual reenactments by authentic patients of Dr. Prematuro who agreed to participate in this study in order to assist others like themselves.
